snippet: Don Sharpes, a senior visiting fellow at Cambridge, writes that American officials’ belief that they can alter the Mideast landscape is misbegotten.
lead_paragraph: Don Sharpes, a senior visiting fellow at Cambridge, writes that American officials’ belief that they can alter the Mideast landscape is misbegotten.

keywords.value: Worthy Fights: A Memoir of Leadership in War and Peace (Book)
